Text: This is a 47 min, 128kbps mp3 recording of Bennett himself, circa 1973. The subject matter is self- transformation psychology/ philosophy The quality is decent. A real and rare gem for those interested in Gurjieff. Thank you michealgarland. I can't seed as I'm currently on a 3g mobile network which in NZ costs $60 a GB but promise to when I get to a landline.
